dataset.select: SELECT id, name, password, is_admin FROM users ORDER BY name
dataset.update: UPDATE users SET name = {{name}}, password = {{password}}, is_admin = {{is_admin}}, change_user = {{__username}}, change_date = datetime ('now') WHERE id = {{id}};
dataset.insert: INSERT INTO users (name, password, is_admin, change_user, change_date) VALUES ({{name}}, {{password}}, COALESCE ({{is_admin}}, 0), {{__username}}, datetime ('now'));
